# TIOTF Governance Documents

This directory contains the formal governance documents for the
**Tire Industry Open Technology Foundation (TIOTF)** and its
wholly-owned subsidiary **Durion Solutions, Inc.**

TIOTF is a Delaware 501(c)(6) non-profit organization dedicated to
open, vendor-neutral technology, interoperability, and cybersecurity
advancement for the tire, fleet, and service-provider industries.

Durion Solutions, Inc. exists solely to operationalize and support
TIOTF technologies under the governance and control of the Foundation.
